text: Ni yingdang jianren, ru you juexin de zhong shizhe nayang jianren, ni buyao yaoqiu tamen suo ying de de xingfa zaori shixian. Tamen yanjian ziji suo bei konghe de xingfa zhi ri, tamen jiang juede fangfu zai chenshi zhi zai baizhou douliuguo pianke. Zhe shi yige tonggao. Wei beini de minzhong, cai zao huimie.
